import { Card, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import WeatherIcon from './WeatherIcon' function TodayDetails({ weatherData }) { const inCelsius = (weatherData.main.temp - 273.15).toFixed(0) const calculateLocalTime = (offset) => { const utcDate = new Date() const localDate = new Date(utcDate.getTime() + offset * 1000) let timeString = localDate.toLocaleTimeString() let timeWithoutSeconds = `${timeString.substring(0, 4)} ${timeString.slice( -2 )}` return timeWithoutSeconds } const localTime = weatherData ? calculateLocalTime(weatherData.timezone) : 'Loading time...' return ( <>

Current Temperature

{weatherData ? ( <>

{weatherData.weather[0].description}

{inCelsius}Â° ) : (

Loading weather data...

)}

Current Weather

Local time: {localTime}

London

 ) } export default TodayDetails
